title: Gay Bears
summary: A story on how I got psyopsed into selling the Apr 2025 bottom

body.raw:
Early last year, the market plummeted ~20% from the highs.

Me, being a chronic twitter scroller, had some posts saved from late December, from users I will not state,

indicating that they had bought a bunch of OTM put options, anticipating that the endless chop would result in a correction.

At first, I agreed with this, keeping in mind 2 principles:

1. I would not follow the trade and buy puts

2. I would wait until a 10% correction in the S&P before buying any stocks.

In following this, (1) was upheld, but (2) was a mess.

I waited until about a 9% correction in the S&P index before buying, and the market briefly pumped before nose-diving another
8-9%.

At this point, I put together a flawed conjecture. If the guys I bookmarked were right about this drop, then surely 
they'll know where the market is heading now, right?

I quickly went through their twitter profile, and found a set of tweets suggesting that a Trump-induced recession was going to
happen. I went through a rabbit hole and ended up finding several related accounts and "theories" arguing that a recession
was imminent, **with or without Trump**. I then went to run.

Ultimately, I kept this 
---
